TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MessageParameterAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MessageParameterAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MessageParameterAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 控制要求的名稱並回應參數名稱。

span.span: Controls the name of the request and response parameter names.

summary.span: 不能與 或訊息合約一起使用。

span.span: Cannot be used with or message contracts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控制參數名稱或傳回值。Use the to control the name of the parameter or the return value. 若參數由 屬性標記，則此屬性無作用。This attribute has no effect if the parameters are marked by the attribute. > [!NOTE] > 作業簽章中參數名稱的值是合約的一部分，而且必須區分大小寫。The value of the parameter names in the operation signature are part of the contract and are case sensitive. 當您需要區分本機參數名稱和描述用戶端應用程式的作業的中繼資料時，請使用此屬性。Use this attribute when you need to distinguish between the local parameter name and the metadata that describes the operation for client applications. 如需有關如何控制 SOAP 本文內容的序列化，而不修改預設 SOAP 封套本身的詳細資訊，請參閱，[在服務合約中指定資料傳輸](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md)，和[使用資料合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For more information about controlling the serialization of the contents of a SOAP body without modifying the default SOAP envelope itself, see , [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md), and [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). 如需有關如何建立訊息合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用訊息合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts.md)。For more information about creating message contracts, see [Using Message Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 建立參數的名稱以及中繼資料內的傳回值。The following code example shows the use of to establish the name of the parameter and the return value in metadata. [!code-csharp[MessageParameterAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageparameterattribute/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageParameterAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageparameterattribute/vb/services.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示針對先前服務產生的服務合約。The following example shows the generated service contract for the preceding service. 請注意，參數名稱目前為 `Input`。Note that the name of the parameter is now `Input`. [!code-csharp[MessageParameterAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageparameterattribute/cs/proxycode.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MessageParameterAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageparameterattribute/vb/proxycode.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 結構描述 (XSD) 中參數的名稱屬性。

span.span: Obtains or sets the name attribute of the parameter in the XML Schema (XSD).

value.span: XSD 中參數的名稱屬性。

span.span: The name attribute of the parameter in the XSD.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 建立參數的名稱以及中繼資料內的傳回值。The following code example shows the use of to establish the name of the parameter and the return value in metadata.
